docs.title: Hello, I'm Anxiu.
docs.text:
​约​ 240 ​个​字​ ​预计​阅读​时间​ 1 ​分钟​

Gopher, also interesting in ML/IOT/Security Tech. Currently studying at MIEC, FZU. That's creating some interesting projects!

Project

The offline plugin adds support for building offline-capable documentation, so you can distribute the [site directory][mkdocs.site_dir] as a .zip file that can be downloaded.

Project Collection

Publication

The meta plugin makes it easy to [boost][meta.search.boost] specific sections in search results or to [exclude][meta.search.exclude] them entirely from being indexed, giving more granular control over search.

Publication List

​本站​共有​ 9 ​个​页面​，913 ​个​字​，64 ​行​代码​。

Abstract

​计算机科学​相关​，​主要​以​理论知识​为主​。

docs.title: Python Virtual Environment
docs.text:
venv ​是​ python ​中​搭建​虚拟环境​的​一个​工具​，​是​ python virtual environments ​特性​中​的​一部分​，​有时​也​会​被​缩写成​ virtualenv

Text Only
Python virtual environments allow you to install Python packages in an isolated location from the rest of your system instead of installing them system-wide. Let’s look at how to use the Python venv, short for Python virtual environment, also abbreviated as _virtualenv_.

​个人​理解​上​，​它​的​作用​类似​于​前端​项目​中​的​ node_module，​将​依赖​包​安装​到​项目​依赖​路径​下​而​不是​系统​依赖​中​。

docs.title: Install
docs.text:
​执行​以下​指令​安装​ python virtual environment，

Python
pip install virtualenv

​也​可以​通过​阿里​云​的​镜像​进行​安装​，

Python
pip install virtualenv -i http://mirrors.aliyun.com/pypi/simple/ --trusted-host mirrors.aliyun.com

docs.title: Get Started
docs.text:
​以下​是​虚拟环境​的​简单​使用​，​笔者​使用​的​是​ win，​路径​自己​改改​分隔符​。

Python
# ​创建​虚拟环境​
<div markdown="1" style="margin-top: -30px; font-size: 0.75em; opacity: 0.7;">
:material-circle-edit-outline: ​约​ 312 ​个​字​ :fontawesome-solid-code: 55 ​行​代码​ :material-clock-time-two-outline: ​预计​阅读​时间​ 2 ​分钟​
</div>
python -m venv .\venv
# ./venv ​为​依赖​创建​的​路径​。

​创建​完成​后​，​终端​进入​虚拟环境​，​使用​ .\venv\Scripts ​下​的​ python.exe ​作为​解释器​。​终端​将会​出现​类似​于​ (venv) ​的​字样​，​显示​已经​进入​虚拟环境​中​。

​如果​终端​没有​成功​进入​虚拟环境​，​可以​使用​ venv ​生成​的​脚本​进行​启动​，

Bash
# For Windows OS,
# In cmd.exe
.\venv\Scripts\activate.bat
# In PowerShell
.\venv\Scripts\Activate.ps1

# For Linux and MacOS, 
source myvenv/bin/activate

​一般来说​，​我们​会​将​虚拟环境​命名​为​ /venv，​这个​文件夹​中将​包含​以下内容​。

Bash
# In windows OS
.
├── Include
├── Lib
│   └── site-packages
├── pyvenv.cfg
└── Scripts
    ├── activate
    ├── activate.bat
    ├── Activate.ps1
    ├── deactivate.bat
    ├── pip3.10.exe
    ├── pip3.exe
    ├── pip.exe
    ├── python.exe
    └── pythonw.exe

# In Linux, 
.
├── bin
│   ├── activate
│   ├── activate.csh
│   ├── activate.fish
│   ├── easy_install
│   ├── easy_install-3.6
│   ├── pip
│   ├── pip3
│   ├── pip3.6
│   ├── python -> /usr/bin/python
│   └── python3 -> python
├── include
├── lib
│   └── python3.6
│       └── site-packages
├── lib64 -> lib
└── pyvenv.cfg

Lib/ ​中​包含​的​是​依赖​文件​，Scripts/ ​中​提供​了​一系列​的​运行​脚本​和​二进制​文件​，pyenv.cfg ​是​一些​可​修改​配置​项​，​你​可以​自定义​使用​的​ home Python Interpretation。

​结束​使用​后​可以​退出​虚拟环境​，​使用​以下​指令​即可​。

Python
# ​退出​虚拟环境​
deactivate
Text Only
title: ​参考资料​
- [Python venv: How To Create, Activate, Deactivate, And Delete • Python Land Tutorial](https://python.land/virtual-environments/virtualenv)
- [​为​python​项目​配置​专属​虚拟环境​ - ​知乎​ (zhihu.com)](https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/463314523)

docs.title: Markdown Grammar
docs.text:
​约​ 96 ​个​字​ 2 ​行​代码​

This is a test file for checking the correct working grammar of markdown.

The first type is inline formats, including bold, italic, inline code, highlight, strikethrough, \(inline formula\) and also the underline. The signal also need to test like ^1^1.

After that, the block components:

docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
docs.text:
​约​ 195 ​个​字​ 7 ​行​代码​ ​预计​阅读​时间​ 1 ​分钟​

For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
Text Only
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

​搭建​环境​

​直接​ git clone

​关于​ material ​主题​

​直接​安装​时​遇到​了​问题​没​排查​成功​，​于是​采用​ python venv ​的​方式​搭建​，​并​在​项目​中​增加​ requirement ​的​ txt ​文件​。

Python
pip install mkdocs-material
pip install mkdocs-glightbox
pip install mkdocs-rss-plugin
pip install mkdocs-statistics-plugin
pip install mkdocs-git-revision-date-localized-plugin

You might meet the error like following during open the social plugin, it means you need some dependency libs to enable the function of card generation. Just install iot. Bash

Required dependencies of "social" plugin not found. Install with: pip install pillow cairosvg

The official document also support this content, Bash

pip install "mkdocs-material[imaging]"
Actually, both of them are same one. https://squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material/plugins/requirements/image-processing/
